DOC.brief_summary: To compare the effectiveness of KRN321 to placebo in the treatment of anemia in cancer patients receiving multi cycle platinum-containing chemotherapy
DOC.brief_title: A Double-blind Study of KRN321 for the Treatment of Anemia in Cancer Patients
DOC.criteria: patients diagnosed as lung or gynecological cancer patients receiving platinum containing chemotherapy written informed consent hemoglobin concentration less than 11 d/dL at enrollment life expectancy of more than 4 months hemolysis, gastrointestinal bleeding, postoperative bleeding iron deficiency megaloblastic anemia any primary hematological disorder that could cause anemia received > 2 RBC transfusions with 4 weeks or any RBC transfusion within 2 weeks before randomization prior treatment with KRN321 received erythropoetin therapy within 8 weeks before treatment
